name: Burger chess
info: This is the latest and greatest product from Derp corp.
cooking_instructions: Grill the beef patty to your preferred level of doneness.
Assemble the burger by placing cheese, lettuce, and tomato on the bun.
Place the grilled patty on top of the vegetables.
Serve the burger and enjoy!
